item.description:
Ms. Sonia Events
Presents
Steppin for the TROOPS Benefit Dinner & Dance

When: 11/06/2010 at 7:00PM
Where: Holiday Inn Select - Woburn
Hotel address: 15 Middlesex Canal Park
Woburn, MA
United States
01801
Attire: Semi Formal
Donation; $50 per person** (Purchase tickets by October 26, 2010)
Contact: MsSonia
781-325-2460
msoniaevents@aol.com
steppin.myevent.com



What a great way to show your appreciation to those who serve.. It's a PARTY dedicated to our men and women serving abroad. Also another reason to get FLY, 1st Sat, Nov 6th.

**Portions of the proceeds help send holiday care packages to military abroad.

For all the details regarding RSVP, itinerary, pricing, purchasing and locations goto;

steppin.myevent.com

The Original Steppers of Boston will be there... Will You?

(information is subject to change, please confirm with steppin.myevent.com. This is not a TOSOB event. Posted with permission of Ms. Sonia Events)

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006
